headline: Did Leadership Overhaul and AI Focus Just Shift J. M. Smucker’s (SJM) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this week, The J.M. Smucker Co. overhauled its leadership structure, eliminating the Chief Operating Officer role as CEO Mark Smucker reassumed the president title and promoted several senior executives to expanded positions overseeing finance, supply chain, category businesses, and marketing. The reorganization also introduces new technology and product-supply leadership paths, with planned hires for a Chief Technology Officer focused on artificial intelligence and new senior roles...
